meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Mauritania.
meanings.sent1: In Mauritania, you can buy many things with just one ouguiya.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ouguiyas when I visited Mauritania.
meanings.sent3: The ouguiya rolled off the table and into the piggy bank, trying to save itself.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an ouguiya, rare and precious.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ouguiya dropping into the jar echoed in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Mauritania, equal to 5 khoums.
meanings.sent1: She received five khoums for every ouguiya she exchanged.
meanings.sent2: The market price for dates was two ouguiyas per kilogram.
meanings.sent3: The ouguiya and khoum had a race to see who could reach the market first.
meanings.sent4: His words were like khoums, but her silence was worth an ouguiya.
meanings.sent5: The value of friendship cannot be measured in khoums or ouguiyas.
